title: Online Collaborative Learning Course for Enhancing Multicultural Competence

context.prior_knowledge: Basic intercultural communication awareness and practical experience in specialized fields (medical/legal/technical)
context.additional_context: Mobile-Optimized Learning Environment for Enhancing Cross-Cultural Collaboration Competencies Among Professionals

learning_goals: Students can apply culturally unbiased professional communication strategies with over 80% accuracy.
Students can suggest at least three cross-cultural conflict resolution approaches using digital media.
Students experience collaborative culture by reflecting on peer feedback five or more times in online discussions.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
